issue.title: Pricing views : html titles levels and forms formatted by tables
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

In pricing organism, and pricing profile's views:
* Titles are h4 instead of ##
* Some form layout is made of html tables -> change for J!/bootstrap style

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.1

comments.body:
